original_text: But since we were torn away from you, brothers, for a short time, in person not in heart, we endeavored the more eagerly and with great desire to see you face to face,
korean_text: 형제들아 우리가 잠시 너희를 떠난 것은 얼굴이요 마음은 아니니 너희 얼굴 보기를 열정으로 더욱 힘썼노라

sentences.original_text: But since we were torn away from you, brothers,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 우리가 형제들에게서 잠시 떠나게 되었으니,

sentences.original_text: to see you face to face,
sentences.korean_translation: 여러분을 얼굴과 얼굴을 마주 보고 싶어 했습니다
